summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching a crosswalk in an urban area. Multiple pedestrians are crossing from left to right, and cyclists are moving across the intersection. The vehicle is maintaining a steady speed and is aware of the surrounding traffic.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the crosswalk. It is being cautious due to the presence of pedestrians and cyclists crossing the road. The vehicle is likely to slow down to ensure safety.
key_objects: 1) Left side: Two pedestrians, approximately 5 meters away, crossing the road from left to right. 2) Right side: A cyclist, approximately 10 meters away, moving across the intersection. 3) Front: A vehicle, approximately 20 meters away, moving forward.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection. Initially, a cyclist is seen on the right side of the road. Suddenly, a pedestrian wearing black clothing runs across the road from the left side, causing a collision. The pedestrian falls in front of the vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is approaching an intersection and maintaining a consistent speed. Upon the sudden appearance of the pedestrian from the left side, the vehicle attempts to brake but collides with the pedestrian, causing the pedestrian to fall.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A cyclist, approximately 10 meters away, moving forward. 2) Left side: A pedestrian wearing black clothing, approximately 5 meters away, running across the road and causing a collision.
